text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ohh! Trainer, you seem a bit down today!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: What, you're not? No—! You can't fool my eyes!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Okay! It's settled then. Tomorrow's training will be "Taiki's Special Happy Course"!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: And a very happy version at that! I'll get 500 crackers ready!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That'll definitely cheer you up! Look forward to it♪
